survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Meal Kit Delivery Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their experience with meal kit delivery services, including satisfaction with meal variety, delivery, and overall service quality.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using meal kit delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How long have you been using meal kit delivery services?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meals offered?
questions.client_notes: A Likert scale is recommended for this question to gauge satisfaction levels effectively.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meals offered?

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with delivery (e.g., late or missing deliveries)?
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify delivery-related pain points. Ensure the scale is clear and consistent.

script.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with delivery (e.g., late or missing deliveries)?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the meal kit service do you value the most? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: A multi-choice question allows respondents to select multiple aspects they value. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: What aspects of the meal kit service do you value the most? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the meal kit delivery service.
questions.client_notes: An open-ended question provides qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the meal kit delivery service.
